title: Random Bolt
data:
{{obsolete}}
{{flavour|Fires, at random, a bolt of venom, negative energy, fire, cold, dispelling energy, electricity, or acid.}}

'''Random Bolt''' is a monster spell which randomly selects and fires one of the following bolts:
*[[Bolt of Fire]]
*[[Bolt of Cold]]
*[[Venom Bolt]]
*[[Bolt of Draining]]
*[[Quicksilver Bolt]]
*[[Corrosive Bolt]]
*[[Lightning Bolt]]

==History==
*Random bolt was removed in [[0.27]]. The only enemy that had the spell was [[Mnoleg]].
*Prior to [[0.19]], there was another monster with this spell, [[Chaos champion]].
*Prior to [[0.18]], the player had an access to this spell through the [[rod of destruction]]. Also, [[Mnoleg]] didn't have this spell.
*Prior to [[0.17]], [[Crystal Bolt]] was one of the possible bolts.
*In [[0.16]], [[Corrosive Bolt]] was added to the list of possible bolts.
*Prior to [[0.14]], Random Bolt was a level 5 spell.
